pli-tv-bi-vb-pc39:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc39:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo antovassaṃ cārikaṃ caranti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc39:1.4: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo antovassaṃ cārikaṃ carissanti haritāni tiṇāni ca sammaddantā, ekindriyaṃ jīvaṃ viheṭhentā, bahū khuddake pāṇe saṅghātaṃ āpādentā”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc39:1.5: Assosuṃ kho bhikkhuniyo tesaṃ manussānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc39:1.6: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc39:1.8: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo antovassaṃ cārikaṃ carantī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc39:1.11: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo antovassaṃ cārikaṃ carissanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc39:1.13: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc39:1.14: “Yā pana bhikkhunī antovassaṃ cārikaṃ careyya, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc39:2.1.6: purimaṃ vā temāsaṃ pacchimaṃ vā temāsaṃ avasitvā.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc39:2.1.8: kukkuṭasampāte gāme gāmantare gāmantare āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc39:2.1.9: Agāmake araññe addhayojane addhayojane āpatti pācittiyassa.
